elements.title: Asik-Asik Falls (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the water of Asik-Asik Falls (pictured) comes from a source inside a cliff?

elements.title: Mokulubete Makatisi (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Mokulubete Makatisi placed eighth at the 2022 Commonwealth Games women's marathon despite running in new shoes that she had received late during the race?

elements.title: The Crimson Diamond (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the developer of The Crimson Diamond first created a series of pixel-art rooms and later built a game around the house she had designed?

elements.title: Norma Bahia Pontes (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that some of the work of lesbian feminist filmmaking pioneer Norma Bahia Pontes is lost media?

elements.title: Tropical Storm Kai-tak (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that while soldiers carried out relief operations for Tropical Storm Kai-tak, the New People's Army attacked them?

elements.title: Milan A. P. Harminc (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Milan A. P. Harminc, the consul-general of the Slovak Republic in London, broke with his government at the outbreak of World War II and sided with the Allies?

elements.title: a doomsday cult (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that there was a doomsday cult named after Neo from The Matrix?

elements.title: prepared chocolate (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a woman was considered a witch because her husband prepared chocolate instead of her?
